LanguageData.Mead.label: hydromel
LanguageData.Mead.description: L'hydromel est exclusivement une boisson fermentée, faite d'eau et de miel.
LanguageData.Makkoli.label: Makkoli
LanguageData.Makkoli.description: Makkoli est un type d'alcool de riz coréen doux et laiteux, issu d'une fermentation des amidons de céréales après cuisson
LanguageData.Wine.label: Wine
LanguageData.Wine.description: Wine is an alcoholic beverage made from fruit fermented without the addition of sugars or other nutrients
LanguageData.Soju.label: Soju
LanguageData.Soju.description: Soju est un spiritueux originaire de Corée.
LanguageData.Whiskey.label: Whiskey
LanguageData.Whiskey.description: whiskey is a type of distilled alcoholic beverage made from fermented grain mash.
LanguageData.Vodka.label: Vodka
LanguageData.Vodka.description: Vodka is a distilled beverage composed primarily of water and ethanol, sometimes with traces of impurities and flavorings.
